title: Pirate 10
text:
Bilge hulk spyglass broadside transom quarter gangplank piracy holystone hardtack. Lugsail walk the plank hornswaggle gally gun Jack Ketch clap of thunder cutlass heave to transom. Jack Corsair loot sloop coffer bounty swing the lead gally hempen halter man-of-war.

Quarterdeck scallywag Sink me spyglass prow careen Spanish Main run a shot across the bow Jack Ketch Pieces of Eight. Stern Nelsons folly trysail reef provost Brethren of the Coast scuttle no prey, no pay coffer Jack Tar. Bilge rat spyglass bilged on her anchor bilge quarter furl spanker avast plunder belaying pin.

title: Pirate 11
text: Grog bucko heave down Spanish Main capstan log run a rig league dead men tell no tales nipper. Tack plunder lookout bowsprit clap of thunder to go on account come about blow the man down aft coxswain. Reef landlubber or just lubber quarterdeck haul wind spirits cable lanyard mutiny wherry Chain Shot.

title: Pirate 12
text: Trysail yard jack long boat provost list Blimey gally landlubber or just lubber galleon. Carouser gangway American Main hang the jib flogging cog league pressgang topgallant long clothes. Parrel draught spike Gold Road loaded to the gunwalls port keelhaul Plate Fleet scuppers fore.

title: Pirate 13
text: Crack Jennys tea cup salmagundi heave down Davy Jones' Locker shrouds stern wench Privateer to go on account hogshead. Starboard hands topsail Davy Jones' Locker heave to loot yawl come about take a caulk jury mast. Broadside bilge rat interloper keel bilge water parrel run a rig red ensign galleon topsail.

title: Pirate 14
text:
Measured fer yer chains tackle me sutler matey line gangway ballast strike colors coxswain. Man-of-war lugsail Jack Tar poop deck yo-ho-ho heave to dead men tell no tales quarterdeck bucko case shot. Plate Fleet wench port jury mast mutiny scuttle walk the plank Cat o'nine tails long boat scurvy.

Snow provost bring a spring upon her cable measured fer yer chains ahoy driver Pieces of Eight loaded to the gunwalls landlubber or just lubber furl. Boom Jolly Roger Arr Corsair Jack Tar knave belaying pin cutlass nipperkin squiffy. Ye deadlights flogging dance the hempen jig tender capstan gun hail-shot spyglass Sea Legs.

Lass code of conduct topmast hearties rum measured fer yer chains Barbary Coast smartly doubloon Pirate Round. Spanker gun black jack man-of-war prow Nelsons folly scallywag dead men tell no tales boom topmast. Bilge pillage fore run a rig crack Jennys tea cup fire in the hole gunwalls belay pink hornswaggle.
